p: In the open commentary, one panelist recommended adding the following statement: Incidental (secondary) findings of clinically actionable, validated genomic results should be made available. Six statements were retained for re-rating in Round 2 (#5–7, #10–12), as well as requests for amendments to four statements (#7, #10–12). The new Statement (#13) regarding return of incidental findings was also put to a panel vote during Round 2.
